tool_description: Searches nutritional database for pet foods and ingredients, returning detailed nutritional information per serving.

food_name.description: Name or brand of pet food product

food_type.description: Food category (dry_kibble, wet_canned, raw, treats, supplements)

error_messages: Food not found: Specified food name not in database
Invalid food type: Use one of [dry_kibble, wet_canned, raw, treats, supplements]
Species mismatch: Food not appropriate for specified species
usage: Search for pet food by providing food_name, food_type, and species_target to get detailed nutritional analysis.

calories_per_cup.description: Caloric content per standard cup serving
